campaignevents-error-invalid-id: Error message used when the given event ID is not valid.
campaignevents-error-empty-title: Error message used when the given event page title is an empty string.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title:
Error message used when the given event page title is invalid.
Parameters:
* $1 - The reason why the title is not valid
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: Error message used when the given event page title has an interwiki prefix.
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: Error message used when the given event page does not exist.
campaignevents-error-invalid-chat-url: Error message used when the given chat URL is invalid.
campaignevents-error-tracking-tool-name-: Error message used when a tracking tool name is given, but not a tracking tool URL.
campaignevents-error-tracking-tool-url-w: Error message used when a tracking tool URL is given, but not a tracking tool name.
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: Error message used when the given tracking tool URL is invalid.
campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Error message used when the given event status is invalid.
campaignevents-error-empty-start: Error message used when the given event start date is empty.
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: Error message used when the given event start date is invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-past: Error message used when the given start date is in the past.
campaignevents-error-empty-end: Error message used when the given event end date is empty.
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: Error message used when the given event end date is invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: Error message used when the start date of an event is after the end date.
campaignevents-error-invalid-type: Error message used when the given event type is invalid.
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Error message used when no event meeting type was specified.
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: Error message used when the given event meeting URL is invalid.
campaignevents-error-physical-no-country: Error message used when the "physical" event type is selected but no country was provided.
campaignevents-error-physical-no-address: Error message used when the "physical" event type is selected but no address was provided.
campaignevents-error-invalid-country: Error message used when the given event country is invalid.
campaignevents-error-invalid-address: Error message used when the given event address URL is invalid.
campaignevents-rest-event-not-found: Error message used when the event ID provided by the user does not correspond to an existing event.
campaignevents-rest-createevent-permissi: Error message used when an unauthorized user attempts to create an event registration.
campaignevents-rest-register-permission-: Error message used when an unauthorized user attempts to register for an event.
campaignevents-rest-register-event-not-o: Error message used when the event that the user wants to (un)register for is closed.
campaignevents-rest-register-event-past: Error message used when the event that the user wants to (un)register for has already finished.
campaignevents-edit-field-page: Label of the event page field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: Content of the help tooltip for the event page field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-start: Label of the event start time field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-end: Label of the event end time field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-meeting-type: Label of the event meeting type field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-type-online: Label of the checkbox for online events on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-type-physical: Label of the checkbox for physical events on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-type-online-an: Label of the checkbox for online and physical events on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-meeting-url: Label of the event meeting URL field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-country: Label of the event country field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-address: Label of the event address field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url: Label of the event chat invite link field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Content of the help tooltip for the event chat invite link field on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-create-form-submit: Label of the form submission button on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-form-submit: Label of the form submission button on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]]
campaignevents-edit-success-msg: Success message shown on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] when the registration was edited successfully
campaignevents-create-success-msg: Success message shown on [[Special:CreateEventRegistration]] when the registration was created successfully
campaignevents-edit-no-event-id-provided: Error message shown on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] when the event id is not provided
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal:
Error message shown on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] for events created on other wikis.
Parameters:
*$1 - The ID of the wiki where the event was created
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: Error message used when the given event page already has another registration associated.
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: Error message used when the user is not allowed to edit the given registration
campaignevents-create-not-allowed-page: Error message used when the user is not allowed to create a registration for the given page
campaignevents-register-error-no-event: Error message shown on [[Special:RegisterForEvent]] and [[Special:UnregisterForEvent]] when no event ID was provided.
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: Error message shown on [[Special:RegisterForEvent]] and [[Special:UnregisterForEvent]] when the event ID provided does not correspond to an existing event.
campaignevents-register-success: Message shown on [[Special:RegisterForEvent]] when the registration went through successfully
campaignevents-unregister-success: Message shown on [[Special:UnregisterForEvent]] when the unregistration went through successfully
campaignevents-delete-not-allowed-regist: Error message shown when the user is not allowed to delete the given event registration
campaignevents-rest-delete-already-delet: Error message used when the event that the user wanted to delete is already deleted.
campaignevents-role-creator: Name of the role of the user who created an event
campaignevents-role-organizer: Name of the role of a user who organizes an event
campaignevents-rest-user-not-found:
Error message used when the user does not exist. Parameters:
* $1 The username.
